title: What can I do here?
excerpt: On the Pearson REVEL page, you
content:
On the Pearson REVEL page, you can:

Select Add Content to search for and select content when you first access REVEL from your Canvas course.

Select Open REVEL to see the REVEL content in a separate window or tab, if you already added content.

Under Help & Support, access instructor or student help, Pearson Support, or diagnostics to give support for troubleshooting issues.

(Grade sync and roster are coming soon!)
